![Wukong Brook 27.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8f/Wukong_Brook_27.jpg)
Another can be done at range, so even if you think you're at a safe distance, be ready to dodge if he adopts a stance and then dashes up for a glowing elbow strike attack.
img_below_text:
By far his most dangerous move will come when he adopts a martial arts stance, holding a raised fist behind his head while dropping the other arm.
![Wukong Brook 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ee/Wukong_Brook_24.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character engaged in combat in a snowy landscape. The character in the foreground appears to be preparing for a confrontation with an opponent in the distance. The preceding text suggests the opponent can perform a ranged glowing elbow strike, while the following text warns of the opponent's most dangerous move involving a martial arts stance. The image serves to illustrate the tense and strategic nature of the combat encounters in the game.
